item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 30, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Limits to Growth was right about collapse (30 points | 8 comments)
3. Show HN: MCP Server SDK in Bash (~250 lines, zero runtime) (35 points | 8 comments)
